content: the creamy crochet coaster is a slip-cover for cork coasters to make them more visually appealing in the home materials * 4 0mm hook * yarn - i used caron cotton cakes * cork coasters i got mine from wal mart * tapestry needle * scissors edited in 2020 to add a full video tutorial and a ton of new photos this project is a perfect gift for your loved one and very customizable to suit your needs
